content: this classically inspired crochet hat is a stylish way to add a pop of color to your look stitched in the perfectly curated shades of red heart super saver o go this quick and easy hat is worked in the round from the top-down in timeless granny stitch clusters replicate the designer s version or use your imagination to create a hat that looks great on you it s one size fits all for this cozy topper so make many to please everyone on your list yarn for model red heart® super saver® o go™ 5 oz/141 g 236 yds/215 m peacock 7155 1 o go
